5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever fasts Ramadan and spends its nights in prayer, out of faith and in hope of reward, his previous sins will be forgiven.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قِيامِ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Qiyam (the voluntary night Prayers) during the month of Ramadan
